extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite     Level 4 and registration in a PHIL Major or Medial Plan and (a minimum GPA of 2.60 in PHIL250 and PHIL257) and (6.0 units in PHIL).

basic.description: An examination of epistemic issues arising from or pertaining to medicine. Possible topics to be considered include the nature of disease, concepts of scientific discovery as found in medicine, and the relationship between medical research and clinical practice.
basic.subject: PHIL
basic.title: Current Issues in Medical Epistemology
